plot: Undercover government man Wally Bradley (Wally Wales) and his pal Chuck (Jim Sheridan) come to the aid of ranch owner Jean Simmons (Peggy Djarling) when a gang of outlaws try to take over her ranch.
title: The Desert Man
plot_es: Undercover government man Wally Bradley (Wally Wales) and his pal Chuck (Jim Sheridan) come to the aid of ranch owner Jean Simmons (Peggy Djarling) when a gang of outlaws try to take over her ranch.
plot_en: Undercover government man Wally Bradley (Wally Wales) and his pal Chuck (Jim Sheridan) come to the aid of ranch owner Jean Simmons (Peggy Djarling) when a gang of outlaws try to take over her ranch.
